name: Jinx Game
description:
Version 1.0.0, pre-alpha i guess?

You were just going about your day, whatever it was, at least you think. Whatever you were doing got cut off, as you blacked out, and awoke here with absolutely no idea of where you are. All you have is a flashlight and a map, and absolutely no means of defense. Monsters aren't real where you come from, but this isn't where you came from.

Jinx the Cat is a cat named Jinx with birth defects who's known online for her large pupils that make her look really high or creepy. Her owner started posting content about her in late 2018 on Instagram. She grew a cult following on the platform which spread to TikTok in 2019 and Twitter in 2021. She became the subject of fan art and memes when creators used her as a reaction image and image macro.

all models made with MagicaVoxel.
